DOC.brief_summary: Test hypothesis milk raise blood sugar well orange juice glucose tablet without raise blood sugar much way orange juice glucose tablet sometimes .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects wear continuous glucose monitor prior test determine normal glucose level . The morning test IV insert subject insulin saline drip start . Blood glucose level check every 10 minute subject becomes hypoglycemic . IVs stop time subject give skim milk , orange juice glucose tablet time . Blood drawn every 15 minute blood sugar stabilize . Blood draw analyzed determine glucose , insulin , epinephrine , norepinephrine , glucagon , cortisol , growth hormone GLP-1 level . Procedure repeat two time use glucose method ( skim milk , orange juice glucose tablet ) .
DOC.criteria: Type 1 Diabetes Able consent Able wear continuous glucose monitor
